game.name: UnGrind
game.shortDescription: UnGrind is a workplace strategy game about clocking out on time. Outsmart your randomly patrolling boss while handling chaotic tasks and annoying colleagues. Plan your route, manage your time, and avoid overtime in this satirical take on office life. Can you escape the daily grind?
game.shortDescriptionEn: UnGrind is a workplace strategy game about clocking out on time. Outsmart your randomly patrolling boss while handling chaotic tasks and annoying colleagues. Plan your route, manage your time, and avoid overtime in this satirical take on office life. Can you escape the daily grind?
